camel.sink.path.persistence.name: camel.sink.path.persistence
camel.sink.path.persistence.description: Whether the topic is persistent or non-persistent One of: [persistent] [non-persistent]

camel.sink.endpoint.batcherBuilder.name: camel.sink.endpoint.batcherBuilder
camel.sink.endpoint.batcherBuilder.description: Control batching method used by the producer.

camel.sink.endpoint.batchingEnabled.name: camel.sink.endpoint.batchingEnabled
camel.sink.endpoint.batchingEnabled.description: Control whether automatic batching of messages is enabled for the producer.

camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxMessages.name: camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxMessages
camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxMessages.description: The maximum size to batch messages.

camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxPublishDe.name: camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxPublishDelayMicros
camel.sink.endpoint.batchingMaxPublishDe.description: The maximum time period within which the messages sent will be batched if batchingEnabled is true.

camel.sink.endpoint.blockIfQueueFull.name: camel.sink.endpoint.blockIfQueueFull
camel.sink.endpoint.blockIfQueueFull.description: Whether to block the producing thread if pending messages queue is full or to throw a ProducerQueueIsFullError

camel.sink.endpoint.compressionType.name: camel.sink.endpoint.compressionType
camel.sink.endpoint.compressionType.description: Compression type to use One of: [NONE] [LZ4] [ZLIB] [ZSTD] [SNAPPY]

camel.sink.endpoint.initialSequenceId.name: camel.sink.endpoint.initialSequenceId
camel.sink.endpoint.initialSequenceId.description: The first message published will have a sequence Id of initialSequenceId 1.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessages.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessages
camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessages.description: Size of the pending massages queue. When the queue is full, by default, any further sends will fail unless blockIfQueueFull=true

camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessagesAc.name: camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessagesAcrossPartitions
camel.sink.endpoint.maxPendingMessagesAc.description: The maximum number of pending messages for partitioned topics. The maxPendingMessages value will be reduced if (number of partitions maxPendingMessages) exceeds this value. Partitioned topics have a pending message queue for each partition.

camel.sink.endpoint.messageRoutingMode.name: camel.sink.endpoint.messageRoutingMode
camel.sink.endpoint.messageRoutingMode.description: Message Routing Mode to use One of: [SinglePartition] [RoundRobinPartition] [CustomPartition]

camel.sink.endpoint.producerName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.producerName
camel.sink.endpoint.producerName.description: Name of the producer. If unset, lets Pulsar select a unique identifier.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.pulsar.configuration.name: camel.component.pulsar.configuration
camel.component.pulsar.configuration.description: Allows to pre-configure the Pulsar component with common options that the endpoints will reuse.

camel.component.pulsar.batcherBuilder.name: camel.component.pulsar.batcherBuilder
camel.component.pulsar.batcherBuilder.description: Control batching method used by the producer.

camel.component.pulsar.batchingEnabled.name: camel.component.pulsar.batchingEnabled
camel.component.pulsar.batchingEnabled.description: Control whether automatic batching of messages is enabled for the producer.

camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxMessag.name: camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxMessages
camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxMessag.description: The maximum size to batch messages.

camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxPublis.name: camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxPublishDelayMicros
camel.component.pulsar.batchingMaxPublis.description: The maximum time period within which the messages sent will be batched if batchingEnabled is true.

camel.component.pulsar.blockIfQueueFull.name: camel.component.pulsar.blockIfQueueFull
camel.component.pulsar.blockIfQueueFull.description: Whether to block the producing thread if pending messages queue is full or to throw a ProducerQueueIsFullError

camel.component.pulsar.compressionType.name: camel.component.pulsar.compressionType
camel.component.pulsar.compressionType.description: Compression type to use One of: [NONE] [LZ4] [ZLIB] [ZSTD] [SNAPPY]

camel.component.pulsar.initialSequenceId.name: camel.component.pulsar.initialSequenceId
camel.component.pulsar.initialSequenceId.description: The first message published will have a sequence Id of initialSequenceId 1.

camel.component.pulsar.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.pulsar.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.pulsar.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessage.name: camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessages
camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessage.description: Size of the pending massages queue. When the queue is full, by default, any further sends will fail unless blockIfQueueFull=true

camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessage.name: camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessagesAcrossPartitions
camel.component.pulsar.maxPendingMessage.description: The maximum number of pending messages for partitioned topics. The maxPendingMessages value will be reduced if (number of partitions maxPendingMessages) exceeds this value. Partitioned topics have a pending message queue for each partition.

camel.component.pulsar.messageRoutingMod.name: camel.component.pulsar.messageRoutingMode
camel.component.pulsar.messageRoutingMod.description: Message Routing Mode to use One of: [SinglePartition] [RoundRobinPartition] [CustomPartition]

camel.component.pulsar.producerName.name: camel.component.pulsar.producerName
camel.component.pulsar.producerName.description: Name of the producer. If unset, lets Pulsar select a unique identifier.

camel.component.pulsar.basicPropertyBind.name: camel.component.pulsar.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.pulsar.basicPropertyBind.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
